description:
The Argon Pants are filled with the highest quality 800FP down. Designed to be worn over a baselayer, the Argon offers extra comfort and warmth around basecamp, in a bivi or to increase your sleeping bag's performance.

They pack down nice and small, making it a no brainer to carry them with you on your expedition, providing you with a boost of warmth when you need it most.

Technical features include a tough and durable Pertex® Quantum outer, stitch-through construction to eliminate cold spots and a two-way front fly zipper.
name: Rab Argon Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.value: 20D 100% Recycled Pertex® Quantum with Fluorocarbon Free DWR (38 g
800FP European Goose Down with Nikwax Fluorocarbon-Free Hydrophobic Finish (160 g
